Title: Police hunt gunman after shooting at Riverwood
Summary: Police say they know the identity of the alleged shooter, and have called on him to hand himself in.

Title: Police return to the crime scene of underworld figure shooting
Summary: Officers conducted a secondary canvass of the crime scene on Tuesday and have renewed their appeal to the public for any information in relation to the shooting.

Title: Man sleeping in car leads police to major drug bust
Summary: Police allege they found 1.5 kilograms of cocaine, weapons and more than $40,000 in cash after raiding the mans Waterloo home.

Title: Beautiful angel dead, two seriously injured after car mounts Wollongong footpath
Summary: Libby Ruge, who died after she was struck by the car, was described as one of the most kindest souls by friends mourning her death on Sunday.

Title: Cops and complaints: officers speak out on policing the police
Summary: Police officers from across NSW say complaints are being “weaponised” and used to push good officers out while protecting underperforming police.

Title: $250,000 reward for info on missing Sydney man
Summary: NSW Police have announced an increased reward for tips on Simon Knight, who disappeared in Surry Hills 15 years ago.

Title: Two people have died in a light plane crash in Central NSW
Summary: Emergency services were called to a property in Carcoar at about 7.45pm, after reports a light plane had crashed after leaving Orange Regional Airport earlier in the afternoon.
Location: Orange Regional Airport Central NSW Carcoar

Title: Former Liberal staffer arrested on child sexual abuse charges
Summary: The man, who has worked for two NSW premiers, faces a series of child sexual abuse charges after a lengthy investigation by police.

Title: I just killed my case manager: Peter Kemball called father after Balmain stabbing, court told
Summary: Peter John Kemball told his father that his case manager was a hitman and Im his job, the NSW Supreme Court heard.

Title: Loss of mother too much for family who hope $500,000 reward brings closure
Summary: Daniel Chetty remains traumatised from the loss of his mother who died from significant acid burns to her body in 2014.
